mapper.select: SELECT t.tname,c.cno,c.cname,l.dname,c.`year`,c.dayOfWeek,c.time,c.startWeek,c.endWeek,c.semester FROM teachers t inner JOIN teaching tg on t.tno = tg.tno INNER JOIN courses c on tg.cno = c.cno INNER JOIN course_locations cl on c.cno = cl.cno INNER JOIN locations l on cl.dno = l.dno WHERE t.tno = #{tno} AND c.year = #{year};

SELECT t.tname,c.cno,c.cname,l.dname,c.`year`,c.dayOfWeek,c.time,c.startWeek,c.endWeek,c.semester FROM teachers t inner JOIN teaching tg on t.tno = tg.tno INNER JOIN courses c on tg.cno = c.cno INNER JOIN course_locations cl on c.cno = cl.cno INNER JOIN locations l on cl.dno = l.dno WHERE c.cno NOT IN ( SELECT cno FROM teaching t WHERE tno = #{tno} -- 替换为目标教师编号 ) AND c.year = #{year};
